amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds being used to research, investigate, or study offshore drilling in the Eastern Gulf of Mexico Planning Area.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graham amendment (A050) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 243 (Roll no. 447).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Graham amendment (A050) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 243 (Roll no. 447).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A050) offered by Ms. Graham.
